```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
# Importing data using the fread function of the data.table package
NealeLab <- fread("NealeLab_rsID_2.tsv")
```

```{r}
head(NealeLab)
```

### Derive the top 100 SNPs with the smallest MAFs

```{r}
NealeLab_sorted <- NealeLab[order(NealeLab$minor_AF, decreasing = F), ]
head(NealeLab_sorted, 20)
```

```{r}
NealeLab_head_MAF <- head(NealeLab_sorted, 100)
write.xlsx(NealeLab_head_MAF, "NealeLab_head_MAF.xlsx")
```

### Plot the histogram of the MAF distribution

```{r}
NealeLab_p <- ggplot(NealeLab, aes(x = minor_AF)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.0001, fill = "#5B79FB", color = "#5B79FB", alpha = 1.0) +
  labs(title = "Histogram of MAF distribution for NealeLab", x = "MAF", y = "Frequency of MAF") +
  theme_minimal()
ggsave("Histogram of MAF distribution for NealeLab.png", NealeLab_p, width = 10, height = 8)
```
